name: Snowboarder (hazzelnut)
description:
Controls:

Left Arrow - Spin Left

Right Arrow - Spin Right

Up Arrow - Boost!  

----

The simplest snowboarding game out there. Like 1-level simple, 3 buttons simple. 

I guarantee you it's that simple. Or you'll be refunded 10 seconds of your life back. 

... Just kidding, I can't do that. Enjoy those 10 seconds. 

----

From the creator of Snowboarder:

"10/10 I spent an embarrassing amount of time tweaking the snow particles. I mean, just look at it! Tell me you're not mind-blown right now."
